languages.text: Гарда сотворенного кузнецами эльдаров меча, изготовленная из призрачной кости. Навершие украшено жутким глазом, источающим аромат скверны.
The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.
languages.original_text: Гарда сотворенного кузнецами эльдаров меча, изготовленная из призрачной кости. Навершие украшено жутким глазом, источающим аромат скверны.

traits.locale_text: A wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with an uncanny eye that exudes an aroma of corruption.
A wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with an uncanny eye that exudes an aroma of corruption.
A wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with an uncanny eye that exudes an aroma of corruption.
A wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with an uncanny eye that exudes an aroma of corruption.
The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.
The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

languages.text: Der Phantomkristall-Handschutz eines Schwerts, das von Aeldari-Waffenschmieden gefertigt wurde. Der Knauf ist mit einem unheimlichen Auge verziert, das Verderbnis ausstrahlt.
languages.original_text: The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Ein Phantomkristall-Handschutz eines Schwerts, das von Aeldari-Waffenschmieden gefertigt wurde. Der Knauf ist mit einem unheimlichen Auge verziert, das Verderbnis ausstrahlt.

languages.text: La poignée en moelle spectrale d'une épée fabriquée par des armuriers aeldaris. Son pommeau est orné d'un œil sinistre qui empeste la corruption à plein nez.
languages.original_text: The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Poignée en moelle spectrale d'une épée fabriquée par des armuriers aeldaris. Son pommeau est orné d'un œil étrange qui exhale un parfum de corruption.

languages.text: 这个剑柄以灵骨制成，由艾达灵族武器工匠锻造而成。剑柄末端装饰着一只邪恶的眼睛图案，散发着腐化的气息。
languages.original_text: The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 这个剑柄以灵骨制成，原本属于艾达灵族武器工匠锻造的剑。剑柄末端装饰着一只神秘的眼睛，散发着腐化的气息。

languages.text: アエルダリの武器職人が作った幽骨の剣の鍔。その柄には、腐敗のにおいを漂わせる不吉な目が描かれている。
languages.original_text: The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

traits.locale_text: アエルダリの武器職人が作った幽骨の剣の鍔。その柄には、腐敗のにおいを漂わせる不気味な目があしらわれている。

languages.text: El guardamano de hueso espectral de una espada fabricada por armeros Aeldari. Su pomo está adornado con un ojo siniestro que apesta a corrupción.
languages.original_text: The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Guardamano de hueso espectral de una espada fabricada por armeros Aeldari. Su pomo está adornado con un ojo extraño que exuda un aroma a corrupción.

languages.text: Aeldari silah ustalarınca dövülmüş, tayfkemikten bir kılıç kabzası. Topuzu, yozluk yayan uğursuz bir göz ile süslenmiş.
languages.original_text: The wraithbone handguard of a sword crafted by Aeldari weaponsmiths. Its pommel is adorned with a sinister eye that reeks of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari silah ustaları tarafından yapılmış, tayfkemikten bir kılıç koruması. Topuzu, yozluk yayan uğursuz bir göz ile süslenmiş.
